overall_assessment: The V2 implementation shows significant improvement over V1, particularly in the status bar rendering and overall polish. The layout, spacing, and typography are well-matched to the design.

feedback.issue: Status bar using emoji placeholders instead of proper iOS icons
feedback.measurement: Baseline uses ðŸ“¶ðŸ”‹ emojis vs proper cellular/WiFi/battery icons in V2
feedback.fix: Replace emoji with SVG icons: <svg> elements for cellular signal, WiFi, and battery indicator

feedback.issue: Search bar divider line could extend slightly more
feedback.measurement: Line appears ~5-10px shorter than full width
feedback.fix: Ensure flex-1 is applied to the divider element with proper padding constraints

feedback.issue: Font rendering appears consistent with design
feedback.measurement: Font family, size, and weight match well

strengths: All navigation items present and in correct order
Two-section structure (primary + 'popular right now') properly implemented
Spacing between menu items is consistent and accurate
Background colors and text colors match design
Chevron (>) indicators on all menu items
Search icon and divider layout correct

iteration_analysis.iterations_needed: V2 reached good fidelity. May need 1-2 more iterations for 90%+
